dmca.title: W. S. CROSS complains of blog copying
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

I wish to complain about a blogger who is using my copyrighted material without permission. The infringing material is contained on the blog "Nobody Notes" http://fafani.blogspot.com/2005_10_09_fafani_archive.html. Since this person does not have a permalink or date stamp on their post, I have enclosed printouts from the infringing post. You will notice that it bears my own copyright notice, as well as forbidding the unauthorized re-use of my materials.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. Furthermore, I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

I ask that you delete this page from the blog, and prevent this blogger from posting any additional copyrighted material from my site or any other.
